wikipedia_page.main: Joyce Heron (born 28 October 1964) is a British judoka. She competed in the women's extra-lightweight event at the 1996 Summer Olympics.She teaches masterclasses in Judo.

response: Elizabeth Joyce Heron (6 November 1916 – 1 April 1980) was a British stage, film and television actress. She was a West End stage star from 1937, and was married to the actor Ralph Michael.
